actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit certain retroactive elections to relinquish the carryback period for net operating losses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers to make a one-time election to forego the carryback of net operating losses incurred in taxable years ending after December 31, 1975, and for which tax returns were filed before August 14, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit certain retroactive elections to relinquish the carryback period for net operating losses.
